name: Coop's Board

name: Cheddar man

name: Jess' Cut Phase
description: PCOS + sema. Prioritizing fiber and breakfast protein. Biweekly measurements and photos.

description: Vegan on GLP-1. Meal prep with tofu/legumes. Tracking iron/B12 energy dips and satiety cues.

name: New Dad Reboot

name: Wedding Cut 2026
description: Engagement photos in 4 months. Sema + calorie floor guardrails; no skipping meals. Dress fitting milestones.

name: Hypertension Helper
description: Doctor-approved GLP-1 use with BP meds. Sodium awareness, daily weigh-ins, weekly averages.

name: Desk Job Undo
description: Sedentary to 8k steps/day. Lunch walk club, water reminders, and resistance bands under the desk.

name: Prep Before Baby

name: Travel While Titrating

name: Strength First Cut
description: Prioritizing lifting 3x/week to preserve muscle. Protein 130g target, creatine, body tape each Sunday.

name: IBS-Friendly GLP-1
description: Low-FODMAP rotation to manage GI while on dose escalation. Tracking trigger foods and relief days.

name: Sugar Cravings Tamer
description: Evening cravings down on GLP-1. Swapping desserts for Greek yogurt bowls. Weekend treat budgeting.

name: Postpartum Power-Up

name: Keto to Moderate
description: Transitioning from strict keto to moderate carbs on GLP-1. Watching energy and gym performance.

name: Plateau Breaker Plan
description: Stalled at week 20; adding step-ups, fluids, and fiber bump. Considering dose increase per MD.

name: Holiday Season Sanity
description: Party-heavy month. GLP-1 helps portions; pre-event protein and one plate rule. No guilt recaps.

name: Fresh Start February
description: Restarting habits after travel. Protein first, 7k daily steps, and journaling hunger cues on GLP-1.

name: Weekend Warrior Wins
description: Dialing in weekends: brunch swaps, mocktails, and pre-logging. GLP-1 helping portion control.

name: Lift + Lose 12

name: Sema & Soccer Mom
description: Busy evenings at the field. Pack protein boxes and electrolytes. Walk laps during practice.

name: Tirz Titration Track
description: Tracking tolerability as dose increases. Small frequent meals, ginger tea, and step goals.

name: Strength Over Scale
description: Focusing on non-scale victories. Heavier lifts, better sleep, and improved stamina on hikes.

name: Couch to 5K GLP-1
description: Run-walk intervals 3x/week. Fuel timing adjusted to avoid nausea with morning doses.

name: Macros Without Mayhem

name: Office Step-Up Squad
description: Stair breaks on the hour, water bottle at desk, and walking 1:1s. GLP-1 dampens grazing.

name: Plate Method Pro
description: Half plate veg, quarter protein, quarter carbs. Simple, repeatable meals for busy weeks.

name: Summer Cut Sprint

name: Protein Palooza
description: Exploring high-protein breakfasts: cottage cheese bowls, omelets, and overnight oats.

name: Wedding Party Prep
description: Bridesmaid timeline with fittings every 6 weeks. Sema supports hunger, lifting preserves curves.

name: Dad Bod to Strong

name: NSV Photo Project
description: Weekly side-by-sides, measuring tape check-ins, and noting cravings improvements.

name: GI Gentle Reset

name: Holiday Hover Plan

name: Sleep First Strategy

name: Morning Dose Crew

name: Evening Dose Routine

name: Trail Prep & Tirz

name: Strength + Steps 10k

name: Brunch Budget Blueprint
description: Smart brunch: protein plate, skip mimosas, and afternoon walk with friends.

name: Meal Prep Minimalist

name: Athletic Mom Momentum
description: Carpool cardio and weekend kettlebells. GLP-1 supports appetite; strength maintains tone.

name: Desk to 10K Steps
description: Hourly stand alarms, lunch loops, and evening dog walks to hit 10k daily.

name: Protein + Plants Push

name: Strength Cycle 1

description: Continuing barbell progress with added accessories. Deload in week 7.

description: Peaking lifts while keeping calorie deficit mild to maintain energy.

name: Nausea Navigation

name: Weekend Trail Runners
description: Building from 5k to 15k trail runs. Sips of electrolytes and protein-forward dinners.

description: Hotel gym intervals and resistance bands in the carry-on. Stick to dosing schedule on the road.

name: Yoga & GLP-1 Flow
description: Gentle vinyasa twice weekly and restorative on Sundays. Focus on breath and recovery.

name: Coach Check-In Cadence
description: Weekly check-ins: hunger ratings, step counts, and training logs. Course corrections as needed.

name: Weekend Meal Prep Club

description: Knife skills, sheet-pan dinners, and spice blends. Cooking at home 5 nights weekly.

name: Protein Coffee Crew

name: Cardio Base Build
description: Zone 2 walks and rides 4x/week to build endurance and aid recovery.

name: Simple Carb Swap
description: Swap refined carbs for whole grains and fruit. Pair with protein to steady energy.

name: Gut Friendly Fiber
description: Increase fiber gradually to 30g with oats, legumes, and leafy greens.

description: No naked carbs. Each meal anchored with 25–35g protein to support satiety and muscle.

name: Weekend Recovery Plan

name: Family Food Flow

name: High Protein Veggie
description: Vegetarian proteins: tofu, tempeh, seitan, eggs, Greek yogurt. Track iron and B12.

name: Sema Side Effect Log
description: Daily notes on appetite, nausea, and energy. Adjust meal sizes accordingly.

name: Tirz Training Tweak
description: Tweaking training days to match appetite and energy. Push lifts on higher appetite days.

description: Long-term base build while losing fat slowly. Dial in fueling and electrolytes.

name: Home Gym Habit
description: Dumbbells, bands, and a bench. 30–40 min sessions, 4 days a week.

name: Dog Walk Daily

name: Meal Kit Mastery
description: Use meal kits wisely: add extra veg, split portions, save leftovers for lunch.

name: Scale + Tape Combo
description: Weekly averages on the scale and monthly waist/hip measurements.

name: Body Recomp Basics

description: Add 2 days of strength to support knees and hips. Keep easy miles easy.

name: Travel Snack Stack
description: Pack shelf-stable protein: tuna packets, jerky, and shakes. Skip the pastry cart.

name: Backyard Bootcamp
description: Bodyweight circuits + bands, 25 minutes. Kids join for fun rounds.

name: Holidays to New Year
description: From Thanksgiving to New Year's: maintain, move, and enjoy mindfully.

name: Travel Dose Timing
description: Shift dosing across time zones gradually. Keep hydration high and meals simple.

name: Beach Readiness Ramp
description: Confidence-building cut: sunscreen, steps in sand, and protein at beach BBQs.

name: Winter Comfort Wins
description: Cozy meals: soups and stews loaded with veg and lean meats. Indoor step hacks.

name: Spring Race Ready
description: Build to a spring 5k with walk-run intervals and strength to support form.

name: Fall Hiking Fridays
description: Friday afternoon hikes as leaves change. Pack protein snacks and layers.

name: Soccer Season Steps
description: Walk laps during kids' games, bring chairs less, move more.

name: Better Breakfasts

name: Evening Snack Strategy

name: Desk Stretch Series
description: Five-minute mobility snacks each hour: neck, hips, and thoracic rotations.

name: Weekend Grill Master
description: Lean grillables: chicken thighs, turkey burgers, shrimp skewers. Add veg sides.

name: Farmers Market Finds

name: Step Streak Squad
description: 30-day step streak challenge with friends. Share wins and routes.

name: Protein Snack Pack
description: Stock fridge with boiled eggs, deli turkey, Greek yogurt, and cheese sticks.

name: Mindful Eating Month
description: Hunger/fullness journal, slow bites, and screens off at meals.

name: Pelvic Floor + Core
description: Postpartum recovery focus with PT-approved core work and walks.

description: Shop the perimeter, read labels, and plan simple proteins + veg.

name: Sleep Hygiene Sprint
description: Wind-down routine: dim lights, hot shower, and cool room before bed.

name: HIIT + Lift Lite
description: Two short HIIT sessions and two strength days. Keep intensity sensible while cutting.

name: Neighborhood Nature Walks
description: Explore new routes, notice the seasons, and rack up steps without the treadmill.

name: Protein Pancake Project
description: Weekend protein pancakes with berries. Freeze leftovers for busy mornings.

name: Lunchbox Level-Up
description: Pack balanced lunches: protein, veg, fruit, and a fun extra.

name: Bike to Work Trial
description: Try bike commutes twice weekly. Prep clothes and lights the night before.

name: After-Dinner Loop
description: 15-minute walk after dinner most nights to aid digestion and steps.

name: Semaglutide Starter Pack
description: Week 1–8 notes: appetite, hydration, and energy. Keep calories steady, not too low.

name: Tirzepatide Level-Up
description: Weeks 9–16: higher dose phase. Make meals protein-forward and keep fiber high.

name: Maintenance Mindset Month
description: Hold steady after a cut. Keep protein and steps high, add back some carbs.

name: Home Chef Habit
description: Cook at home 5 nights weekly. Rotate favorite high-protein meals.

name: Weekend Sports Crew
description: Adult rec leagues on Saturdays. Cross-train midweek and hydrate.

name: Park Run Prep
description: Build to a weekly parkrun. Focus on consistency over speed.

name: Hunger Scale Habits
description: Eat at 3–4, stop at 6–7. Track hunger before and after meals.

name: Fiber Focused 30
description: Hit 30g fiber daily with beans, berries, chia, and whole grains.

name: BBQ Season Strategy
description: Protein first at BBQs, skip the chips, and enjoy fruit for dessert.

name: Travel Jet Lag Fix
description: Light meals, sunlight exposure, and short walks to reset quickly.

name: Kitchen Gadget Gains
description: Use the air fryer and instant pot to make protein + veg easy and tasty.

name: Micros Matter Month
description: Focus on vitamins and minerals: colorful plates and a daily multi if needed.

name: Run-Commute Rookie
description: One run-commute per week. Pack a small backpack and plan a shower at work.

name: Birthday Goal Board
description: Countdown to birthday with weekly progress pics and step challenges.

name: Anniversary Adventure
description: Build endurance for a celebratory hike weekend. Keep nutrition simple and protein-forward.

name: Nurse Night Shift Plan
description: Pack protein-heavy meals, hydrate, and take stair breaks during charting.

name: Teacher Term Time
description: Back-to-school routine: lunch prep, hallway steps, and after-school walks.

name: Bulk to Cut Bridge
description: Transition from surplus to slight deficit carefully while keeping lifts strong.

name: Run Streak Lite
description: A mile a day minimum, with strength twice weekly to support joints.

name: Kitchen Clean-Out
description: Clear the pantry and restock with protein and produce-focused staples.

name: Sushi Night Smarts
description: Order sashimi, edamame, and a roll with extra protein. Skip the tempura.

name: Mediterranean Month
description: Mediterranean-inspired meals: fish, olive oil, legumes, and loads of veg.

description: High-protein pasta, lean meats, and extra veg in the sauce.

name: Weekend Adventure Crew
description: Kayak, hike, or bike each weekend. Pack protein snacks and lots of water.

name: Protein + Produce Budget
description: Healthy on a budget: frozen veg, canned tuna, and sales on lean meats.

name: Kitchen Scale Skills
description: Weigh protein portions for a few weeks to recalibrate eyeballing.

name: Sunday Soup Setup
description: Make a big soup weekly: beans, chicken, or lentils with lots of veg.

name: Smoothie Smart Start
description: Protein smoothies with greens and berries. Sip slowly; avoid chugging on GLP-1.

description: Share an entree, add a protein side, and enjoy a walk after dinner.

description: Find the skewer stand, skip fried, water between drinks, lots of steps.

description: Travel-friendly meals, plenty of water, and daily morning walks with cousins.

description: Sunday reset: fridge clean, grocery run, and plan 4 dinners.

description: Garage gym crew lifting together twice weekly. Log PRs and celebrate.
